Topic.Title: Michelle and Barack are both hate-filled racists who occasionally slip up in public on open mic’s. It's part of who they are, have been for their entire lives

Message.Msg: Condescending doesn't begin to describe what real men think of you. If you are a white European your ancestors have had hundreds of years of history in their favor. Native land handed out like candy, people they could buy to do their work for them, segregation and racism that gave them advantages in jobs, schools, housing, government services, loans, transportation, groceries and everything else. And not one of them could pull themselves up from the dregs to enter the middle class? Not one gentleman farmer? Not a bootlegger? Not one to take advantage of the GI Bill? You are the product of generations of failures who failed in a system that was set up to see them succeed. And what do you do? Pull yourself up by the bootstraps? Try to make something out of yourself? No. You sit in your basement and your Captain D's blaming others for your pathetic life, practically begging the government to suppress and enslave others. What I feel for you is not condescension. Disgust and contempt is what I feel for you. I may one day have a bunch of colored grand kids--gay colored grand kids even. And I will be happy. And I'll be just a little bit happier knowing that you and your fellow racists are very, very unhappy.

Topic.Title: How many "green jobs" will $529 million buy?

Message.Msg: The Solar thing just got a little more interesting...REALLY! Ran this through Truth or Fiction. The Tonopah Solar company in Harry Reid's Nevada is getting a $737 million loan from Obama's D.O.E. The project will produce a 110 megawatt power system and employs 45 permanent workers. That's costing us just $16 million per job. One of the investment partners in this endeavor is Pacific Corporate Group (PCG). The PCG executive director is Ron Pelosi who is the brother to Nancy 's husband . EVERY AMERICAN SHOULD KNOW HOW THEIR MONEY IS BEING STOLEN.

Topic.Title: How many "green jobs" will $529 million buy?

Message.Msg: Obama's bailout of Chrysler was just as good as Truman's, no? But Obama did not bailout Fisker or Solyndra. You'd be better off comparing these efforts to the broad government efforts to develop electricity and electronic technology from the turn of the century on throught he development of the internet. Were there some failures of companies that received government support? Certainly. But as I type a message on my computer to send to you over the internet, I can't help but feel the overall effort was a success.

Message.Title: And this just in...
Message.Msg: ...Pat Robertson Says Fewer Miracles Happen For 'Sophisticated' Americans Taught Evolution Routers 4/2/13 Pat Robertson, renowned disc jockey on The 700 Club, and crusader to do away with The Department of Education, recently attempted to explain why more miracles seem to happen for “simple, humble” foreigners than for Americans. His answer suggested that too much education was an impediment to receiving a miracle from God. He stated “... it has to do with evolution...Those people overseas didn't go to Ivy League schools,” he said...”That's what God's looking for. That's why they have miracles.” When asked if God only performs miracles for stupid people, Smokey Robinson, lead singer of The Miracles, chuckled and broke into ‘Tears of a Clown’: “Now there's some sad things known to man But ain't too much sadder than The tears of a clown, when there's no one around Uh hum, oh yeah baby” Oh, yeah, baby…you can’t make this stuff up.

Message.Title: Is FDIC planning to eliminate insured deposits with this plan?
Message.Msg: The next assault to White CITIZENS= their bank deposits? Will YOU the depositor bail out the banks in the future?(you`re safe deposit boxes willprobably be seized also). I read these excerpts at washington blog. This is a real plan written by the F #$%$? PREPARE. "Although few depositors realize it, legally the bank owns the depositor’s funds as soon as they are put in the bank. Our money becomes the bank’s, and we become unsecured creditors holding IOUs or promises to pay. But until now the bank has been obligated to pay the money back on demand in the form of cash. Under the FDIC-BOE plan, our IOUs will be converted into “bank equity.” The bank will get the money and we will get stock in the bank. With any luck we may be able to sell the stock to someone else, but when and at what price?. The 15-page FDIC-BOE document is called “Resolving Globally Active, Systemically Important, Financial Institutions.” It begins by explaining that the 2008 banking crisis has made it clear that some other way besides taxpayer bailouts is needed to maintain “financial stability.” Evidently anticipating that the next financial collapse will be on a grander scale than either the taxpayers or Congress is willing to underwrite, the authors state: An efficient path for returning the sound operations of the G-SIFI to the private sector would be provided by exchanging or converting a sufficient amount of the unsecured debt from the original creditors of the failed company [meaning the depositors] into equity [or stock]. In the U.S., the new equity would become capital in one or more newly formed operating entities. In the U.K., the same approach could be used, or the equity could be used to recapitalize the failing financial company itself—thus, the highest layer of surviving bailed-in creditors would become the owners of the resolved firm. In either country, the new equity holders would take on the corresponding risk of being shareholders in a financial institution

Message.Title: The fate of one White Man in FL
Message.Msg: You may have already heard about this tragic story which occurred near Tampa FL a few weeks ago. A man was sleeping when a sink hole opened up around his bed and swallowed him. His brother, who I believe was in another room, jumped in the sink hole and tried to help him as he cried for help, but was unable to help him. This story has really creeped me out because what I can gather from the news stories is that within a day or two the house was demolished, the sink hole filled in and a chain link fence put up around the property to keep out trespassers. Apparently, from what I have heard and read NO ATTEMPT whatsoever was made to rescue that poor man. It sounds as though there wasn`t even any consideration of whether a rescue attempt could be made. Needless to say, the man was White and I would guess working class or poor. And needless to say, if that man would have been colored there is no way they would have so hurriedly and without fanfare possibly have smothered him with dirt. This is the how the story of the White MAN in Florida appears to me today, ONLY MY OPINION (and probably most of America). If he stumbles and fall, he will be plowed under without the least consideration or thought, and probably those responsible for his demise will feel self righteously good and grand for doing it. Because they will be making room for the colored illegal law breakers the government criminals want to replace the White man with. You know, Florida and its leaders - from top to bottom- are appearing more and more creepy and ghoulish to me everyday. Or are they simply incompetent, or do they simply hate poor White MEN?
